placeholder: Payment will be charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase. Subsciptions will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of current period. Your account will be charged according to your plan for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. You can manage or turn off auto-renew in your Apple ID account settings at any time after purchase.
en: Payment will be charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase. Subsciptions will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of current period. Your account will be charged according to your plan for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. You can manage or turn off auto-renew in your Apple ID account settings at any time after purchase.
pt_br: Ao confirmar a compra o pagamento será cobrado na sua conta iTunes. As assinaturas serão renovadas automaticamente, a menos que a renovação automática seja desativada pelo menos 24 horas antes do final do período. Sua conta será cobrada de acordo com seu plano para renovação, dentro de 24 horas antes do final do período. Você pode gerenciar ou desativar a renovação automática, nas configurações da sua conta Apple, a qualquer momento após a compra.

placeholder: error when redirecting for privacy Policy page
en: error when redirecting for privacy Policy page

en: b) the deletion of your account will not suspend or cancel any active subscription you may have. In such a case, you will have to cancel your active subscription via the corresponding app store
pt_br: b) a exclusão da sua conta não suspenderá ou cancelará qualquer assinatura ativa que você possa ter. Nesse caso, você terá que cancelar sua assinatura através da loja de aplicativos correspondente

placeholder: to continue you need to confirm please
en: to continue you need to confirm please

placeholder: don't forget to log into the Blkards and complete your activities. Your progress is waiting for you!
en: don't forget to log into the Blkards and complete your activities. Your progress is waiting for you!
pt_br: não se esqueça de entrar no Blkards e completar suas atividades. Seu progresso está esperando por você!

placeholder: hello!. Welcome to Blkards, we are thrilled to have you here and look forward to helping you achieve your academic goals
en: hello!. Welcome to Blkards, we are thrilled to have you here and look forward to helping you achieve your academic goals
pt_br: olá!. Bem-vindo ao Blkards, estamos entusiasmados em tê-lo aqui e ansiosos para ajudá-lo a alcançar seus objetivos acadêmicos

placeholder: google account not found please try to link with email
en: google account not found please try to link with email
pt_br: conta do google não encontrada, tente vincular com e-mail

placeholder: we're sorry, an authentication error has occurred. Please try logging in using a different authentication method. Make sure to select a valid login option.
en: we're sorry, an authentication error has occurred. Please try logging in using a different authentication method. Make sure to select a valid login option.
pt_br: desculpe, ocorreu um erro de autenticação. Tente fazer login usando um método de autenticação diferente. Certifique-se de selecionar uma opção de login válida.

placeholder: a verification code was sent to the email:
en: a verification code was sent to the email:
pt_br: um código de verificação foi enviado para o e-mail:

placeholder: please tap here to edit your email if you misspelled it
en: please tap here to edit your email if you misspelled it
pt_br: por favor, toque aqui para editar seu e-mail se você digitou errado

placeholder: pin code invalid, please enter a pin code valid
en: pin code invalid, please enter a pin code valid
pt_br: código PIN inválido, digite um código PIN válido

placeholder: please enter the confirmation code received by email
en: please enter the confirmation code received by email
pt_br: digite o código de confirmação recebido por e-mail

placeholder: follow your progress daily and reach your goals
en: follow your progress daily and reach your goals
pt_br: acompanhe o seu progresso diariamente e alcance seus objetivos.

placeholder: personal achievement list is empty. You can create one by clicking the button below
en: personal achievement list is empty. You can create one by clicking the button below
pt_br: sua lista pessoal de conquistas esta vacia, Pode criar presionando no botão embaixo

placeholder: do want to delete your target
en: do want to delete your target

placeholder: something went wrong please restart the app
en: something went wrong please restart the app

placeholder: what is the average time to answer each kards
en: what is the average time to answer each kards
